laws.full_text:
hallenging the Rule. Until now, those lawsuits had given mixed and confusing signals about whether employers would need to comply with the Rule by September 4.
That changed on August 20, 2024, when a Texas federal court in Ryan, LLC v. FTC found that the Rule was unlawful and said the FTC can’t enforce the Rule anywhere in the nation.
Of course, this ruling is likely to be appealed, but in the meantime out Michigan Non-Disclosure Agreements






BlogWhat to Know About New York Non-Disclosure Ag
